docs.title: Adjectives
docs.text: Zerita English amar sweet bel beautiful bon good magn big mal bad nov new rik rich

docs.title: Colours
docs.text:
There are 13 base colours in Zerita:

Zerita English blank white ner black ruj red verd green azul blue flav yellow brun brown purpur purple roz pink bej beige cian cyan oranj orange griz grey

There are two prefixes for the colour shade:

Zerita English lum light skur dark

and four adjectives for the colour finish:

Zerita English metalik metallic mat matte glos glossy neon neon

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
1. azul glos

    • translation: glossy blue

  2. skurruj

    • translation: dark red

  3. lumverd

    • translation: light green

docs.title: Nouns
docs.text: Zerita English akv water aur dawn aut car avis bird cen dinner crep dusk dokum document dom house eserc army fil child (offspring) furk fork instruk documentation kokl spoon kolt knife libr book nam name puer child (young human) ros rose paren parent postcen dessert

docs.title: Verbs
docs.text: Zerita English bul boil don give edr eat emer buy glak freeze jog play kant sing leg read maner stay niv snow olf smell perd lose pluv rain pot drink rid laugh s is vink win
